law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 90, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 284, effective January 2, 1978. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Petition for court approval -- Affidavits -- Guardian ad litem -- Order of approval.
metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 96 would have amended this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1,1982.
